isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - HOOD SEALS

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Seals for 5000 i and 9000 i Series
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 159 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check hood seal (Item 1) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace it.
Position hood seal (Item 1) on cowl tray flange (Item 2) with hood seal mounting groove (Item 3) over cowl tray flange and push firmly down onto cowl tray flange.
Close hood and fasten latches on both sides of hood.

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Seals for 5000 i SBA Series with Optional Butterfly Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 16 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Check cowl hood seal (Item 1) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace it.

Position cowl hood seal (Item 1) on cowl tray flange (Item 3) with hood seal mounting groove positioned over cowl tray flange and push firmly down onto cowl tray flange. Also refer to (Items 1, 2 and 3, Figure 154) for cowl hood seal installation.
Check radiator shell hood seals (Item 4) and seal pads (Items 8 and 11) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace them.

Position left or right side radiator shell hood seal (Item 4) on radiator shell flange (Item 5) and secure by aligning push-in fasteners starting with the first hole next to front hinge bracket (Item 12). Push the push-in fasteners through the radiator shell flange; use a small hammer and tap each fastener to ensure the seal stays secured. NOTE that the fourth and fifth holes (Item 14, circle A) and first and second holes (Item 15, circle B) from the top of radiator shell side seam will not be used. These holes are used while installing bracket with seal pad (Items 7 and 8, view in circle A) and (Items 10 and 11, view in circle B) . Repeat procedure to install the other radiator shell hood seal.

If seal pad (Item 8, view in circle A) or seal pad (Item 11, view in circle B) was removed from bracket (Item 7, view in circle A) or (Item 10, view in circle B), position new seal pad on bracket and install two push-in fasteners (Item 13, view in circle A and circle B) to secure it to the bracket.

Position bracket with seal pad (Items 7 and 8, view in circle A) under top of radiator shell flange (Item 5), and align holes in bracket (Item 7) with fourth and fifth holes (Item 14, circle A) from front hinge bracket (Item 12). Install two sheet metal screws with flat washers (Item 6) through the hood seal, radiator shell flange and bracket (Items 4, 5 and 7) and install speed nuts (Item 6) underneath bracket and tighten.

Position bracket with seal pad (Items 10 and 11, view in circle B) on the inside of the radiator shell flange (Item 5), and align holes in bracket (Item 10) with first and second holes (Item 15, circle B) from the top of radiator shell side seam. Install two sheet metal screws with flat washers (Item 9) through the radiator shell hood seal, radiator shell flange and bracket (Items 4, 5 and 10) and install speed nuts (Item 9) underneath bracket and tighten (driver side shown). Repeat for passenger side.
Close right and left side hoods and fasten both latches on each hood.
